Your Client Journey with BeOn Step by Step

1

1- Send Your Marketing Campaigns

  • Choose the appropriate channel:
  • WhatsApp Broadcast - Bulk SMS
  • Accurate statistics on message engagement.
2

2- Receive Advertising Messages with Maximum Efficiency:

  • Automatic distribution to:
  • Team members - AI Agent - Workflow
  • Fast responses - Performance tracking - Reports and analytics
3

3- Collect Client Data Accurately:

  • Customer interests - Client stage in the sales funnel
  • Detailed data (location, purchasing power, etc.)
  • Follow-up schedules - Notes and reminders
4

4- Take the Appropriate Action:

  • Feed advertising platforms with data to improve performance.
  • Customized messages for each stage in the sales funnel.
  • Identify high-value customers.

Smart Messages Powered by Artificial Intelligence (AI-Message)

You've got a new team member!

Your AI employee handles many tasks supporting your team with intelligent responses and helping them understand and analyze customer conversations. Receive more chats, with less effort, and greater intelligence...

Empower Your Team

I'm your AI assistant helping your team craft the right replies to customer messages, saving their time, and offering valuable suggestions.

Analyze Customer Intent

I'm your AI assistant helping your team understand and analyze customer intent (inquiry, complaint, purchase), suggesting suitable responses, and boosting conversion.

Instant Replies

I'm your AI assistant no need to burden your team with repetitive questions. I handle instant responses and provide your customers with immediate answers.

Why choose BeOn ?

We are considered the best provider of business communication services because we rely on the best technical engineers, and we work on developing systems that meet market needs and make it easier for companies to communicate with customers, so BeOn always remains at the forefront when it comes to customer communication services.

Competitive prices

We are distinguished by our competitive prices for all the services we provide, transparent pricing with no hidden fees, and a variety of packages to suit all business sizes.

Ease of control and use

The BeOn development team always works on building a system and dashboard that is easy to use and easy to integrate via API with any software system.

Customer service that protects BeOn's reputation

We provide outstanding and fast support that befits our valued customers and enhances BeOn's position.
